trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> controls in the current container.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um conversor de tipo que recupera uma lista de controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> no contêiner atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter> class and provides a type converter specifically for controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter> classe deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter> classe e fornece um conversor de tipo especificamente para controles que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.AssociatedControlID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: Ele é usado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.AssociatedControlID%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56) or [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre conversores de tipo, consulte [como: implementar um conversor de tipo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56) ou [conversão do tipo generalizada](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter" />.

trans-unit.source: **Note** You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** você nunca deve acessar um conversor de tipo diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, chame o conversor apropriado usando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte os exemplos em <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.

trans-unit.source: The control instance to test whether it is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" />.
trans-unit.target: A instância de controle para testar se é um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the provided control inherits from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o controle fornecido herda de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="control" /> inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <paramref name="control" /> herdar a classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter.FilterControl(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> method returns <see langword="true" /> when the control is an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: A implementação do <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter.FilterControl(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> método <see langword="true" /> quando o controle é uma instância do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter" /> override this method to provide their own filtering mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Classes que derivam de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter" /> substituir esse método para fornecer sua próprias de filtragem de mecanismo.
